amendment.description: Amendment increased funding for the Heavily-Indebted Poor Country Trust Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to fully fund the Administration's request of $225 million for debt relief for the world's poorest countries in FY 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 211 (Roll no. 397).
